english.segment1: I know I'm just another Judas, kiss your face. While I drive the nail through your hand. I know I'm just another Thomas, won't believe. Until I feel the hole in your hands. Then I will say, my God, I see not what you see. My God, what do you see in me? My god, crowned in glory. The lamb of God is worthy
english.segment2: My sin yells, crucify! louder than the mob that day. My sin yells, crucify! louder than any mouth.
english.segment3: I know I'm just another Judas, kiss your face. While I drive the nail through your hand. I know I'm just another Thomas, won't believe. Until I feel the hole in your hands. Then I will say, my God, I see not what you see. My God, what do you see in me? My god, crowned in glory. The lamb of God is worthy
english.segment4: My sin yells, crucify! louder than the mob that day. My sin yells, crucify! louder than any mouth.
